data.name: Minami Kamakura High School Girls Cycling Club: A Challenge From Mr. Bear?!
data.short_description: As part of a school event, the first-years are required to participate in a competitive orienteering activity that pits the clubs against each other. While the girls enjoy strolling around Kamakura, Mr. Bear appears before Hiromi and her friends and issues Hiromi a challenge...

fullgame.name: Minami Kamakura High School Girls Cycling Club

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
